relations.target: game: a single play of a sport or other contest; 'the game lasted two hours' <i37811>
party: an occasion on which people can assemble for social interaction and entertainment; 'he planned a party to celebrate Bastille Day' <i75850>

senses.definition: A social gathering before a party or a sports game.
